Docs.summary: Gets a relationship to the given source relationship.
Docs.returns: A relationship to , or if no relationship exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation stores relationships in a dictionary using weak references, so the relationship table does not keep objects alive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SetRelationship method clears any existing relationship if the relationship parameter is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.MemberRelationship>.
